Package circuitbuilder

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • circuitbuilder.LogicGateIO
      • circuitbuilder.Input
  • class Input
extends LogicGateIO
    The Input class extends the Logic Gate IO class and serves as the input pin on the gates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) static int INPUT_HEIGHT
